articles.title: Jon Stewart Uses 'Daily Show' Return to Equate Trump and Biden - The Daily Beast
articles.description: In his long-awaited return to hosting “The Daily Show,” Jon Stewart made almost no distinction between America’s two elderly presidential candidates.
articles.content: The fate of The Daily Show was never more uncertain than in the weeks leading up to Comedy Centrals Hail Mary decision to bring back Jon Stewart as Monday night-only host through the 2024 presidentia… [+3761 chars]
